name: ahngbeom-claude-config
description: Custom Claude Code plugins with specialized development agents for backend, frontend, data science, DevOps, healthcare analytics, mobile development, and productivity

plugins.name: backend-agents
plugins.description: Backend development agents for API architecture, Node.js, Spring Boot, FastAPI, and database design

plugins.name: frontend-agents
plugins.description: Frontend development agents for React, Vue, and modern web UI development

plugins.name: data-agents
plugins.description: Data science and ML agents for data analysis, engineering, machine learning, and computer vision

plugins.name: devops-agents
plugins.description: DevOps and Git workflow agents for CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub/GitLab, Railway, and version control

plugins.name: healthcare-agents
plugins.description: Healthcare analytics agents for medical data normalization (ICD, SNOMED), statistical analysis, and forecasting

plugins.name: mobile-agents
plugins.description: Mobile and desktop application agents for React Native, Flutter, AR/VR (ARKit/ARCore), Electron, and Tauri

plugins.name: productivity-agents
plugins.description: Productivity agents for documentation, testing, Jira/Git retrospectives, and workflow automation
